skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: A Front-End Developer specializes in creating the visual and interactive aspects of a website or web application, focusing on building responsive, user-friendly interfaces using technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks such as React, Next.js, and Redux.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: A Back-End Developer specializing in Node.js, Express, and MongoDB builds scalable server-side applications and APIs, managing data flow and ensuring high performance with a flexible, NoSQL database.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: A UI & UX Designer using Figma for design and utilizing Freepik and Pinterest for inspiration to create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Webflow Development involves creating responsive, visually appealing websites using Webflow's no-code platform, allowing for custom designs, animations, and interactions with a focus on ease of use and flexibility without needing to write extensive code.
